mapper.select: SELECT sm.cCusCode AS cusCode, sm.cCusName AS cusName, sm.cSOCode AS soCode, sb.cInvCode AS invCode, sb.cInvName AS invName, sb.dPreDate AS preDate, sb.iQuantity as planQty, db.iQuantity as delyQty FROM SO_SOMain sm INNER JOIN SO_SODetails sb ON sm.id = sb.id LEFT JOIN DispatchLists db ON sm.cSOCode = db.cSOCode AND sb.iRowNo = db.iorderrowno WHERE sb.dPreDate = '2018-07-02'
